title: Which company has never changed its logo over time throughout its existence? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is a good question Komal Almost every company modified its logo from time to time or make a little tweaks. To make the brand timeless and up to the mark. The company that doesn't changed it's logo from the origin is NIKE swoosh mark. Logotype of like change many times but the Swoosh is still the same as it designed by Carolyn Davidson in 1971.
